title: navigating with Tab key and Shift-Tab between folder and message list
content: Why can't I no longer use Tab and Shift-Tab for navigating between folders and message list, instead getting this extraneous/unnecessary clutter of other controls in between? (I'm blind, I use the NVDA screenreader and rely on keyboard navigation instead of the mouse, and F6 and Shift-F6 is also not nearly as efficient either!) This is a backward step with this update, and I can't find any option (for all the supposed customisation) to get rid of these other controls - Spaces menu, Search box or get it out of the way at least!
creator: vivienpalcic

title: Thunderbird Attach File(s) window has Preview Pane
content: When I open a Write window, type in the text, and click the Attach button, the Attach File(s) window that opens has a Preview Pane, whereas my Windows File Explorer windows do not have that pane. How do I get rid of the Preview Pane in the Attach File)s) window? Thanks.
creator: groucho3

title: thunderbird error message
content: Meu Thunderbird passou a apresentar uma mensagem de erro toda vez que eu o coloco em execução. Isto vem acontecendo há cerca de um mès e não sei a razão. Segue printscreen dessa mensagem. Já fiz as configurações para que o Thunderbird seja o aplicativo padrão dos sufixos de email e o erro persiste. Alguém pode me ajudar?
creator: EduardoSa

title: TB Menu button too close to window controls
content: I don't mind the new look Thunderbird (115.5.0), except that I keep clicking the menu button when I intend to minimise the window, especially on a tablet. It's too close to "Minimise window". The thread at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1418752 helped me to put the main window menu bar at the top, where it traditionally is and where I prefer it, but the window controls moved with the button bar so the problem remains! How can I restore the window controls to their proper place in the top right-hand corner, while keeping the main window menu bar at the top, please?
creator: robert373

title: Bug: Spaces toolbar keeps reappearing (TB 115.1.0 for macOS)
content:
Hello,

I am using Thunderbird 115.0.1 (64 bit) on a device with macOS 13.4.1. (EDIT: The issue also persists with version 115.1.0.)

I have disabled the spaces toolbar. When I close the Thunderbird window, but let the app run in the background, the spaces toolbar reappears when I re-open the window. Not every time, but at least twice a day. I can't seem to recognize a pattern when that happens.

The bug has existed since the release of Thunderbird 115.
creator: AlmaCookies

title: La carpetas IMAP no se sincronizan hasta que no entro
content:
Uso un correo electrónico de ionos por IMAP, en el servidor tengo un reglas que me mueve ciertos mensajes de correo electrónico a ciertas carpetas, para no saturar mi bandeja de entrada, aunque le de a "recibir" o pase el tiempo de 30 minutos que tiene asignado, no me muestra el número que indica que hay mensaje sin leer "parece que tampoco los sincroniza", es al entrar en la carpeta que se descargan y lo muestra.

¿Se puede cambiar el comportamiento? Es decir cuando se haga recibir o pase el tiempo, verifique todas las carpetas IMAP y las sincronice.

P.D. Acabo de activar lo que "RESALTE" en la imagen y parece que es el funcionamiento que quería, lo pongo en imagen.
creator: milorcete

title: Constant crashes since upgrade
content:
Long time Thunderbird user. I really hope to be abled to solve this. My Thunderbird freezes after a few seconds while trying to fetch messages.

things I tried unsuccessfully:

  • delete the sql message index
  • create a new profiles with just one email adress of various mail providers
  • delete AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird and reinstall thunderbird

I am at the end of my wits here

title: Thunderbird frequently does not shut the background process
content: Frequently, after closing Thunderbird by pressing the Red "X" in the top right corner, emails continue to load in the background. The Thunderbird process is still active. This does not happen all the time, but very annoying. Any ideas ? Thunderbird 102.13.0 (64-bit) Windows 11 - Updated

title: Unable to print emails without them spanning multiple pages
content:
When I go to print an email it ends up being over multiple pages. The first page will have the email header including who from, who to, date and subject, the next page has the body of the email with the 3rd being the sender details. This despite the body of the email only being a few lines long. If the email trail is a number of emails I end up with pages and pages to print.

Would appreciate help as I don't feel like destroying multiple trees when I need a hard copy to go on file.

Thanks, and cheers.
creator: annesch1

title: I can't connect my server to Thunderbird
content:
Hello,

I have a server and trying running 'POSTFIX' mail server, and I want to connect 'Thunderbird mail' to it.

On the server side, the following ports are open: 143 ALLOW Anywhere 466 ALLOW Anywhere Postfix ALLOW Anywhere

So I set Thunderbird mail to connect to these ports:

-Incoming: port 143 (screenshot 1) -Outgoing: port 465 (screenshot 2)

but the connection isn't successful, when I want to send mail this is the error shown:

======================

Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) bytsnbytes.com failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again.

======================

When I want to get messages, it tells me connection is refused.

what is the problem and how to fix it? -Regards

Website: https://www.bytsnbytes.com
creator: mabaashar

title: TB 115, Messages Stuck in Outbox, Folder Repairs Are Unusual
content:
Since at least this morning, TB 115.1.0 is putting outbound messages into my Outbox and not sending out. I checked all the server settings, they are correct. This is only happening in Thunderbird and I haven't changed any settings.

I have a ton of messages in this profile and the outbound messages I have stuck are a bit important. Have I encountered a bug?

I tried doing Repair on some of the mailbox folders (Inbox) and get some weird results. One account is sticking several non-Spam messages in the Spam folder and won't allow me to take them out, and that's on a different account -- I have like three Gmail accounts configured.

Help! :)
creator: forrie1

title: I do not get my email in Thunderbird however I can send email.  This is my 3rd request  so please respond
content: Can not get email thru thunderbird but can send emails. Can not figure out how to correct.

title: Thunderbird does not delete save drafts after email is sent
content: Why is it that Thunderbird 102.13 keeps the drafts around for messages that I have already sent? It is darn frustrating to have to go into my IMAP account and get rid of drafts that TB automatically saved for messages that I have sent hours or days ago.
